abstract: Palestinian teenager Jihad Jaafari is killed when a raid by Israeli military on Deheishe refugee camp in Bethlehem, West Bank, turned into a violent clash; Israeli spokeswoman suggests he was instigator of events while Palestinian Authority governor Jibreen al-Bakri says he was simply a curious resident awoken by noise.
lead_paragraph: Palestinian officials identified the dead man as Jihad Jaafari, a resident of the Deheishe refugee camp.

headline.main: Israeli Forces Kill Palestinian Man in West Bank Clashes

snippet: Palestinian officials identified the dead man as Jihad Jaafari, a resident of the Deheishe refugee camp.
